Good Comments: Slayers = sequel of an inherently 90s series, therefore consistency with 90s translations = good. And if "translating for the 21st century" means awkward, overliteral crap that reads terribly in English, I'd rather stay in the 90s.
Chose to use the ancient outdated official translation's wordings and choices. Go back to the 90's and take off the nostalgia goggles, then try to learn to translate for the 21st century please.
Bad Comments: I thought their translation did a great job of capturing the spirit of Slayers... I wish they hadn't dropped it :(

Good Comments: Manages to have few to no QC errors, extremely accurate translations, and releases nearly the day after the show airs. Highly recommended if you don't want to wait for Rumbel.
